question:
Which of the following sites of India have received recognition under Globally Important Agricultural
Heritage Systems (GIAHS)?
1. Traditional Agricultural System of Koraput, Odisha
2. Below Sea Level Farming System of Kuttanad, Kerala
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Traditional Agricultural System of Koraput, Odisha and Below Sea Level Farming System of Kuttanad, Kerala are sites of India that have received recognition under Globally Important Agricultural Heritage Systems (GIAHS).
